sense.def:
A bear
je velika močna zver z gostim kožuhom in ostrimi kremplji.

To bear something
pomeni nekaj nesti;

seg.quote: Camels and donkeys bear those goods inland.
She arrived bearing a large bunch of grapes.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
bears the weight of something else
, nosi težo neke druge stvari.

seg.quote: His ankle now felt strong enough to bear his weight.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
bears a particular mark or characteristic
, ima tako znamenje ali značilnost.

seg.quote: The scene bore all the marks of a country wedding.

sense.def:
To bear something difficult
pomeni nekaj hudega sprejeti in prenesti.

seg.quote: Their policies are putting a greater strain on the economic system than it can bear.

sense.def:
Kadar rastlina
bears flowers, fruit, or leaves
, iz nje zrastejo cvetovi, sadeži ali listi.

To bear someone a feeling
, pomeni, da do nekoga čutimo na primer ljubezen ali sovraštvo;

seg.quote: He bore his children no malice.

sense.def:
To bring pressure or influence to bear on someone
pomeni uporabiti pritisk ali vpliv, da bi nekoga pregovorili, naj nekaj stori.

seg.quote: The group's aim is to bring pressure to bear on Parliament to get the law changed.

sense.def:
To bear left
ali
to bear right
pomeni, da pri vožnji ali hoji za malenkost zavijemo v levo ali desno.

Kadar nekaj
bears someone out
ali
bears out
, kar nekdo govori, potem to podpira.

seg.quote: The claims are not borne out by the evidence.

sense.def:
To bear with someone
pomeni, da smo z nekom potrpežljivi.

seg.quote: I hope you'll bear with me as I explain.
